text: it's critical to select the right
foundation model for your use case to
optimize the accuracy and performance of
generative AI
applications while also ensuring it
aligns with your company's style and
brand voice however evaluating models
requires expertise in data
science you need the right benchmarking
data sets metrics and algorithms to test
models and automate them for integration
into your development process
also evaluating qualitative criteria
such as friendliness and humor requires
human judgment but building and
operating human evaluation workflows is
timec consuming and
tedious AWS accelerates the
process enabling you to evaluate compare
and select Foundation models in just a
few
clicks you can leverage AWS curated data
sets for specific use cases and metrics
or bring your own custom data set simply
select Foundation models and the type of
task for
evaluation then AWS runs tests and
automatically generates a report with
side-by-side comparisons of the models
against selected
criteria fully managed workflows allow
you to bring your own employees or use
an AWS managed team for human review and
evaluation start evaluating Foundation
models in Amazon safe P maker
today
